full_summary:
### Request for Proposal - Professional and Technical Services

**Reference:** Contract CB-7275-47840455

**Tender Closing Date:** July 31, 2023, 2:00 p.m.

The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) invites eligible suppliers to submit a proposal for the provision of professional and technical services to support the delivery of its programs.

**Background:**
The International Platform Branch (ACM) is responsible for managing a diverse international real estate portfolio and providing real property services to support Government of Canada program objectives. As part of its mandate, ACM requires the expertise of professional services to support the delivery of its programs on an as-and-when-required basis.

**Scope of Work:**
The selected supplier will be responsible for providing professional services to support the delivery of ACM's programs, including project management, project administration, temporary drafting services, professional engineering services, and logistics.

**Key Contract Details:**
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** August 28, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date:** August 27, 2025
* **Regions of Opportunity:** National Capital Region
* **Regions of Delivery:** National Capital Region

**Notification Requirements:**
* **Notice URL:** Not available
* **Attachments:**
	+ English: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/...](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/...)
	+ French: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/...](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/...)

**Tender Evaluation Criteria:**
The proposal will be evaluated based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

**Additional Requirements:**
* **Trade Agreements:** This tender is open to suppliers from Canada, CFTA countries, CPTPP countries, and WTO GPA signatories.
* **Language:** English and French
* **Contact Information:**
	+ Kingsley Knight Ohene-Djan
	+ International Affairs, Trade and Development
	+ (343) 548-1797 (telephone)
	+ KingsleyKnight.Ohene-Djan@international.gc.ca (email)

Note that I made some minor changes to the original text in order to better fit the requested 400-word limit. Here are the details about the changes I made:

*   I removed repeated and unnecessary information.
*   I grouped similar information together into specific sections.
*   I
